You meet 7 inhabitants: Zenobia, Ianthe, Elowen, Nephele, Eurydice, Evander, and Quillan. Zenobia was heard saying, "Eurydice is a knave if and only if Zenobia is a knight". "Quillan is not a knight," Ianthe claimed. Elowen said, "Quillan is a knave." Nephele asserted: "Eurydice is a knight if and only if Zenobia is a knight". Eurydice said, "Nephele is a knave and Eurydice is a knight." Evander noted, "Quillan is a knight". "If Zenobia is a knight then Evander is a knave," Quillan declared. So who is a knight and who is a knave?
solution_text: Zenobia is a knave, Ianthe is a knave, Elowen is a knave, Nephele is a knight, Eurydice is a knave, Evander is a knight, and Quillan is a knight.
solution_text_format:
(1) Zenobia is a knave
(2) Ianthe is a knave
(3) Elowen is a knave
(4) Nephele is a knight
(5) Eurydice is a knave
(6) Evander is a knight
(7) Quillan is a knight
